job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to enhancing or modifying an existing AI system, which falls under the broad category of model improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback
job_tasks.justification: Providing feedback on AI-generated solutions is a form of model evaluation and fine-tuning, which is a core part of the modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly states involvement in fine-tuning AI models, a key aspect of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools implies building and integrating them into systems, which aligns with software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating AI capabilities into a broader system for customer support, which is a software development task.

soft_skills.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes improving and fine-tuning AI models, directly aligning with the 'Modeling' task category for GenAI. The responsibilities also include integrating AI capabilities into customer support systems and prototyping new AI tools, indicating a strong focus on application development around generative AI.
